New Records: Muhammad Amir and Imad Wasim return to the national team after a long gap
Key Match Events: The series is the second successive white-ball tour of New Zealand to Pakistan
Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam is back as captain for Pakistan, while Michael Bracewell leads New Zealand despite several key players missing
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the second in the series and is played at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium
Others: Key New Zealand players are missing due to IPL commitments and personal reasons
